children.text: “The Monster Mash: Everything You Didn’t Know” is a podcast episode from the show “Too Much Information” in 2024. The following audio is by Alex Heigl and Jordan Runtagh. The annotations of this podcast episode are organized by a summarization of Heigl and Runtagh’s conversation and the themes of Boris Pickett’s personal life, career trajectory, influences, horror culture, and the song’s production and origin.

label: The Monster Mash: Everything You Didn't Know (2024)
